Title: Mr. Kaplan (No. 4)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), John Eisendrath (teleplay by), Lukas Reiter (story by), J.R. Orci (story by)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Facing a crippling siege on his organization, Red tracks a thief enlisted by Mr Kaplan for a mysterious assignment. Agent Gale takes extreme measures in his investigation into the conduct of his Task Force.
